page.content: Over half of those questioned went out for a social drink weekly or more frequently. However over 33% rarely went out for a social drink. 40% of adults ate out frequently usually for pub meals. The majority ate out once a month. 56% only occasionally entertained relatives or friends to dinner etc. Theatre and cinema were rarely patronised, 17% never go, whereas 65% rarely go. Weekly evening classes were attended by 21% of the adults surveyed. The most popular classes were for yoga, keep fit and aerobics. Other classes included pottery and French. When questioned about holidays in Britain or abroad:_ Holidays abroad, annually 21%. Holidays in Britain: annually 27%.
